subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Racing before a record-setting crowd of about 72,000, Classic Pack beat 13-1 odds to win yesterday’s $100,000 West Point Handicap at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y. Retribution opened a 10-length lead on the field until the head of the stretch, but Classic Pack, a 4-year-old son of Regal Classic, made his move under Cornelio Velásquez by coming up the outside. He won the mile-and-an-eighth event on the Mellon turf course by three quarters of a length in 1 minute 47.77 seconds.
